sentences.en: Building Material, Iron and Steel, Timber Timber Products and Plank, Plywood.
sentences.cn: 采购产品建材, 铁和钢, 木材,木材产品和厚木板, 夹板.

sentences.en: Compares with the xylose plywood, the processing bamboo plywood difficulty is bigger.
sentences.cn: 跟木胶合板相比, 加工竹胶合板难度更大.

sentences.en: Glues for veneers, plywood, interior woodwork such as panels and so on.
sentences.cn: 用来粘合美耐板 、 三夹板, 或是壁板、门板等室内木制品的粘胶.

sentences.en: High - density plywood was used for all formed surfaces.
sentences.cn: 对所有模板表面均使用了高密度的胶合板.

sentences.en: I nested the pieces to make the best use of the plywood.
sentences.cn: 我组装这些碎片使胶合板得到充分利用.

sentences.en: In plywood the wood has been cut into veneers.
sentences.cn: 在制胶合板时,把木材切成单板.

sentences.en: Much modern furniture is not solid but uses a sandwich of wood veneer on plywood.
sentences.cn: 许多现代家具用的并非实心木料,而是在胶合板上镶上一层木板饰面而已.

sentences.en: Plywood die are of high quality, and quality template.
sentences.cn: 胶合板制模切版质量高, 并且模版质量轻.

sentences.en: That piece of plywood will just fit the bill.
sentences.cn: 那块胶合板正符合要求.

sentences.en: The furniture is made of plywood covered in teak veneer.
sentences.cn: 这家具是用贴柚木薄片的合板做成的.

sentences.en: The table is made of plywood covered in teak veneer.
sentences.cn: 这张桌子是以镶以柚木饰面薄板的合板制成的.

sentences.en: They had capped the roof with plywood.
sentences.cn: 他们在房顶上加盖了胶合板。

sentences.en: This plywood addition helps to strengthen the structure.
sentences.cn: 多层胶合板有助于加固结构。

sentences.en: This project uses bamboo or plywood, template surface is smooth, tight joints.
sentences.cn: 本工程采用竹胶板或胶合板, 模板表面光洁平整, 接缝严密.

sentences.en: Wood Based Products , Timber , Plywood , Mdf, Logs, Flooring, Deckings Plywood.
sentences.cn: 采购产品木材, 夹板, 记录, 地板, 夹板.

trans.tran_en: a material made of several thin layers of wood that are stuck together to form a strong board
